Token.Abstract: MDLPublication represents a publication, as described by Mendeley.
Creates a MDLPublication and initializes its name property.
Sends a top publication API request using the shared client and fetches the response as an array of MDLPublication.

Parameter.Name: categoryIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: If not nil, the identifier of the category, otherwise across all categories.

Parameter.Name: upAndComing
Parameter.Abstract: If true, results apply to ‘trending’ publications.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes one argument: an array of MDLPublication objects.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

Token.Abstract: Sends a user top publication API request using the shared client and fetches the response as an array of MDLPublication.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes one argument: an array of MDLPublication objects.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.
